meanings.definition: The act of secreting in excess.
meanings.sent1: The oversecretions of oil on my face caused acne.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are concerned about the oversecretions of hormones in the patient's body.
meanings.sent3: The oversecretions of tears during sad movies always ruin my mascara.
meanings.sent4: The oversecretions of gossip in the office created a toxic environment.
meanings.sent5: The oversecretions of sweat during exercise made her shirt stick to her skin.

meanings.sent1: The oversecretions of saliva made it difficult for him to speak clearly.
meanings.sent2: The oversecretions of mucus in her nose made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent3: The oversecretions of ink from the pen created a messy desk.
meanings.sent4: The oversecretions of perfume in the room overwhelmed my senses.
meanings.sent5: The oversecretions of sap from the tree attracted ants and bees.
